name: datocms-plugin-better-title
description: A plugin that automatically concatenates multiple fields to use for your Title field.

scripts.start: cross-env NODE_ENV=development parcel src/index.html --port 1235  --cert localhost.crt --key localhost.key --out-dir .parceljs
scripts.build: cross-env NODE_ENV=production parcel build src/index.html --out-dir dist --public-url ./ --no-source-maps

author: CJ Lazell

global.label: Development mode?
global.hint: Enable development logs on the console

global.label: API token
global.hint: Please provide a READ-ONLY API token, so that we can get the Links field values.
